reviews.customers_say: Customers find the robe attractive, with one noting the charming ruffle detail on the sleeve, and appreciate its smooth satin material that drapes beautifully. The robe receives positive feedback for its fit, with one mentioning it's roomy enough to tie comfortably, and customers describe it as comfortable and good value for money. The material quality receives mixed reviews, with some finding it luxurious while othe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Very cute and soft Read more
items.author: Halee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing says royalty like an elagant satin robe
items.body: Got this for my gf for her birthday to compliment the bathset gifted to her and she's gonna love it!! Its elegant soft rich in color and feels amazing on your skin. Perfect as a lil gift for your partner family member or a special friend. Yet the best gift to self to have something nice to relax in at the end of the day. Definately recommended and money well spent. Read more
items.author: Parishianbalgere

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Material
items.body: Robe is very comfortable, sexy, and fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Night Robe
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: I really loved the color of this robe. I really wanted a robe to wear after I get out of the shower and this one was cute and made of silky material. I loved the vibrant color but the sizing was a size bigger than I expected. I wanted something a little tighter but it's okay. Softness: This material felt luxurious and very nicely made. Read more
items.author: Gaby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great!
items.body: This is a really nice satin robe, I use it a few times a week. I like the little ruffles on the sleeves which keep the robe from appearing really plain. I am 140 lb 36D and this one size robe has plenty roomy to close and tie it comfortably. Great find! Read more
items.author: Choppers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, but cute for one day
items.body: I bought one for myself and for each of my bridesmaids to get ready in. Felt very soft, though the material is kinda slippery so it tended to fall open in the front, especially for those of us who are plus sized. Comes folded in a bag, you'll definitely want to iron them flat before pictures cause the creases are pretty significant. Not super breathable unfortunately, I found myself sweating a little bit (mostly from nerves of the big day). Not sure how it would hold up over long period of time, we only used them for the one day and I dont really wear mine anymore. Overall, cute and cheap for one day when we could all match without breaking my bank. Read more
items.author: Leah Niven

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality but check for stains
items.body: I ordered 12 robes for a pajama party and two of them had stains on the front and back of them out of the package. Be sure to look it over when you take it out of the package. Otherwise the quality is nice and fits true to size. Read more
items.author: geree mcclendon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxuriously Comfortable!
items.body: I recently purchased the Avidlove Women's Kimono Robe, and I am absolutely in love with it! The satin fabric is incredibly soft and silky against the skin, making it perfect for lounging around the house or wearing after a shower. The fit is flattering, and the short length adds a touch of elegance without sacrificing comfort. I appreciate the lightweight design, which feels breathable yet luxurious. It’s perfect for warmer weather or layering over pajamas. Overall, this robe has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and stylish addition to their loungewear collection! Read more
items.author: Ally smith

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Light Coffee, Deep Green, Ice Green, Purple Red, Cobalt Blue, Black, Orange, 01champagne, 01white, Deep Grey, Lavender, Deep Blue, Pink Bow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
